sentences.en: Discovery's takeoff this morning from Cape Canaveral was flawless.
sentences.cn: “发现号”今晨从卡纳维拉尔角的发射是完美的。

sentences.en: He got through without a mistake--flawless and precious triumph.
sentences.cn: 他没有犯任何错误——完美无缺，赢得了宝贵的胜利。

sentences.en: In any event, my mother and her red pen showed me how deeply flawed a flawless essay could be.
sentences.cn: 无论如何，我的母亲和她的红笔向我展示了一篇完美无瑕的文章会有多少缺陷。
